text: "Lil Freak" is a song by American singer Usher. It was released as the second single from his album Raymond v. Raymond (2010). The song features Trinidadian rapper Nicki Minaj. It was written by Minaj, Usher, Ester Dean, Blac Elvis and Polow da Don. It samples American soul singer Stevie Wonder's 1973 hit, "Living for the City". "Lil Freak" was released on March 2, 2010. ==Charts== Chart (2010) Peak position UK Singles Chart 109 US Billboard Hot 100 40 US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs 8 == Release history == Country Date Format Canada March 2, 2010 Digital download United States ==References== Category:2010 songs Category:Usher songs
title: Lil Freak
